definition: few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: Please Keep out of the reach of children.
sentences.chinese: 请将本品置于少儿不宜接触的地方。

sentences.english: Junior school English education. Interest and Hobbit building.
sentences.chinese: 少儿英语启蒙教育，兴趣和习惯的建立。

sentences.english: This bookshop sells books for children.
sentences.chinese: 这家书店出售少儿读物。

sentences.english: This paper presents a research work in children Truing test.
sentences.chinese: 报告了关于少儿图灵测试的一项研究工作。

sentences.english: Next two-day event will be richer, to meet the needs of young children's audience.
sentences.chinese: 今明两日的活动将更加丰富，以满足青少儿观众需求。

sentences.english: Format designed to facilitate children's reading as the first principle.
sentences.chinese: 开本设计以方便少儿阅读为第一原则。

sentences.english: What are the principles of the CYLE Series?
sentences.chinese: 《剑桥少儿英语丛书》的宗旨是什么？

sentences.english: The results appear in July's Archives of Pediatrics &Adolescent Medicine.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果显示在七月份的青少儿医学档案库里。

sentences.english: I went to Shanghai for Children's Model Show last summer holiday, I got a medal.
sentences.chinese: 去年暑假，我去上海参加了上海少儿模特大赛。

sentences.english: Zinbocyo is a bookstore for children in Tokyo, Japan.
sentences.chinese: 日本东京的神保町书店是一家少儿图书店。

sentences.english: The trend comes amid growing awareness of mental-health problems in small children.
sentences.chinese: 眼下大众对少儿心理健康问题的关注意识越来越强。

sentences.english: Where can I buy the CYLE Series?
sentences.chinese: 在哪里能买到《剑桥少儿英语丛书》？

sentences.english: Obijective To observe the effects of Compound tea polyphenols oral rinse in treatment of gingivitis in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察复方茶多酚含漱液对少儿牙龈炎的治疗效果。

sentences.english: One pupil won second prize in the Children's English Competition for the 2008 Olympic Game.
sentences.chinese: 一名学生荣获上海市“迎奥运少儿英语大赛”第二名。

sentences.english: Kaiser encourages physiciansto use TeenScreen with all of their adolescent patients.
sentences.chinese: 凯泽鼓励医生对所有青少年患者使用少儿普查。

sentences.english: There is no age limit, upper or lower, except for Young Learners English Tests.
sentences.chinese: 除了剑桥少儿英语考试以外其他考试没有年龄限制。

definition: early education (abbr. for 早期教育[zao3 qi1 jiao4 yu4])
to make learning fun/to combine education and entertainment
tai-pan/business executive/foreign business manager/top class of kindergarten or school grade
variant of 啟蒙|启蒙[qi3 meng2]/to instruct the young
to instruct the young/to initiate/to awake sb from ignorance/to free sb from prejudice or superstition/primer/enlightened/the Enlightenment/Western learning from the late Qing dynasty
books (in a library or bookstore)/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]
